from PIP_COMM_PATIENT

mapper.update:
update PIP_COMM_PATIENT
IS_JOIN_MSG = #{isJoinMsg},
IS_SUBSCRIBE = #{isSubscribe},
MOBILE = #{mobile},
IS_SMOKING = #{isSmoking},
IS_XJGSBS = #{isXjgsbs},
IS_SYSTEM_DIABETES = #{isSystemDiabetes},
LAST_FOLLOWVIEW_DATE = to_date(#{lastFollowviewDate},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
where PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and PATIENT_ID = #{patientId}

update PIP_COMM_PATIENT set PATIENT_NAME = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LCC_CODE = #{lccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATIENT_CODE = #{patientCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN1 = #{linkMan1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN1_MOBILE = #{linkMan1Mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_MAN1_RELATION = #{linkMan1Relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_6STATE = #{is6State,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select l.project_id , d.vcode , d.vname as name , count(1) as value from pip_comm_patient p , pip_comm_lcc l , pip_comm_dict_district d where p.project_id = l.project_id and p.lcc_code = l.lcc_code and p.risk_code is not null and d.vcode = l.area_code and p.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.project_id, d.vcode, d.vname

select l.project_id , d.vcode , d.vname as name , count(1) as value from pip_comm_patient p , pip_comm_lcc l , pip_comm_dict_district d where p.project_id = l.project_id and p.lcc_code = l.lcc_code and p.IS_FOLLOWRISK = '1' and d.vcode = l.area_code and p.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.project_id, d.vcode, d.vname

select l.project_id , d.vcode , d.vname as name , count(1) as value from pip_comm_patient p , pip_comm_lcc l , pip_comm_dict_district d where p.project_id = l.project_id and p.lcc_code = l.lcc_code and p.IS_FOLLOWVIEW = '1' and d.vcode = l.area_code and p.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.project_id, d.vcode, d.vname

select l.project_id , l.lcc_code , l.lcc_name as name , l.workload, count(1) as value from pip_comm_patient p , pip_comm_lcc l where p.risk_code is not null and p.project_id = l.project_id and p.lcc_code = l.lcc_code and p.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.project_id, l.lcc_code, l.lcc_name , l.workload

select l.project_id , l.lcc_code , l.lcc_name as name , l.workload, count(1) as value from pip_comm_patient p , pip_comm_lcc l where p.IS_FOLLOWVIEW = '1' and p.project_id = l.project_id and p.lcc_code = l.lcc_code and p.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by l.project_id, l.lcc_code, l.lcc_name , l.workload

select p.*,lcc.lcc_name lccName from pip_comm_patient p left join pip_fee_info pf on p.patient_id=pf.patient_id left join pip_comm_lcc lcc on p.lcc_code=lcc.lcc_code left join pip_comm_dict_district dis on dis.vcode = lcc.area_code where p.BELONG_GROUP in ('01','02','11','12') and p.IS_SUBSCRIBE =1 and p.is_join_msg =1 and p.is_smoking in ('1','2') and p.mobile is not null

select p.*,lcc.lcc_name lccName from pip_comm_patient p left join pip_fee_info pf on p.patient_id=pf.patient_id left join pip_comm_lcc lcc on p.lcc_code=lcc.lcc_code left join pip_comm_dict_district dis on dis.vcode = lcc.area_code where 1=1
and dis.vname like '%${lccName}%'
and pf.st_type=2
and p.risk_code is not null and pf.st_type=1
and p.is_followview=1 and pf.st_type=1

select info.PATIENT_ID as patientId, info.MEDICALHIS_MI as medicalHis_MI, info.MEDICAL_INSURANCE as medicalInsurance, info.SEX as sex, info.AGE_GRADE as age_grade, info.EDU_LEVEL as edu_level, (case when p.IS_DIABETES=1 then 1 else 2 end)is_diabetes from PIP_COMM_PATIENT_INFO info left join PIP_COMM_PATIENT p on p.PROJECT_ID=info.PROJECT_ID and p.PATIENT_ID=info.PATIENT_ID where info.PATIENT_ID=#{patientId}
mapper.update: update pip_comm_patient set process_types=#{value} where patient_id=#{patientId}

update pip_comm_patient set send_type = 2 where patient_id in (
select p.patient_id from pip_comm_patient p left join pip_uqs_answerqn_log al on p.project_id = al.project_id and p.patient_id = al.patient_id and substr(al.uqs_version, 5, 3) = '014' and al.state = 1 where group_date is not null and al.patient_id is null and (sysdate - group_date) > 210 and send_type != 2
union all
select p.patient_id from pip_comm_patient p left join pip_uqs_answerqn_log al on p.project_id = al.project_id and p.patient_id = al.patient_id and substr(al.uqs_version, 5, 3) = '014' and al.state = 1 where al.state = 1 )

update pip_comm_patient set send_type = 2 where patient_id in ( select p.patient_id from pip_comm_patient p left join pip_uqs_answerqn_log al on p.project_id = al.project_id and p.patient_id = al.patient_id and substr(al.uqs_version, 5, 3) = '011' and al.state = 1 where al.patient_id is not null and (sysdate - al.create_date) > 210 and p.send_type != 2 )
